attributes.action: increase the rate at which stamp duty is liable to be paid.A starting rate of £400,000 would be more economically sound, taking inflation into account.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is grossly unfair to charge people a form of tax on the price of their home, when it has increased through economic factors: heavy demand,lack of supply and explosion in population numbers. This is a direct result of you and your government failing to control the population, allowing the number of refugees and immigrants to increase alarmingly.  We, the people should not have to pay the price for this calamity. Nor should the poorest in society be swept up into a tax net that is only supposed to catch the very richest percentage of people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
